column1:
share on x jg john gosselink. jun 20 at 3:43 pm clyde was one of those friends that was always there. in years past we fished together on lake conroe and out on the water he was as at home as any man could be. we always got to laugh a lot, tell some really good jokes and catch lots of fish. clyde always checked on me if there was a problem and was a huge loving support when my wife nancy died. real friends are there and don't really have to say much. clyde was a real friend and i will miss him. i know he suffered a lot the last few years of his life and his suffering is over as he now has gone home to be with the lord! praise god! john gosselink. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jun 20 at 3:37 pm beautiful in blue was purchased for the family of clyde miller. share on x lb laura breitenstein. jun 20 at 2:32 pm madonna and family, i just want you to know how very sorry i am to hear of clyde's passing. as you say my sweet friend, he is an angel now and will be forever watching over you. sending much love and prayers for all of you. laura b. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jun 19 at 6:00 pm strength & solace spray was purchased for the family of clyde miller. share on x jun 19 at 4:25 pm pink tribute spray was purchased for the family of clyde miller. share on x vn vickie & terry nation. jun 19 at 3:12 pm vickie & terry nation purchased the crystal cross bouquet for the family of clyde miller. share on x jun 19 at 2:50 pm blooming garden basket was purchased for the family of clyde miller. share on x more memories... visitation. jun 20. 4:00 pm - 6:00 pm sam houston memorial funeral home - willis10129 fm 1097 wwillis, tx, us, 77318. get missed the service? get order flowers now for clyde's funeral services cemetery details. smith memorial park cemetery - willis10129 fm 1097 wwillis, tx, us, 77318. get show less view & service share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of clyde miller vickie & terry nation and 4 other friends sent flowers to the family of clyde miller. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! ck claudia koons. jun 20 at 6:18 pm madonna and family, we were so sorry to hear about the passing of clyde. you and clyde were one of the first couples we met when we moved to pt. aquarius twenty years ago. we will miss seeing him taking his puppy dog for a ride on the golf cart. our thoughts are with you during this very sad time. kip and claudia koons. comment share comment share facebook twitter
